data.subTitle: stringify转格式化字符串
data.content:
'use strict';

var xiaoming = {
    name: '小明',
    age: 14,
    gender: true,
    height: 1.65,
    grade: null,
    'middle-school': '\"W3C\" Middle School',
    skills: ['JavaScript', 'Java', 'Python', 'Lisp']
};
var s = JSON.stringify(xiaoming,null,' ');
console.log(s)

输出结果：

{
  "name": "小明",
  "age": 14,
  "gender": true,
  "height": 1.65,
  "grade": null,
  "middle-school": "\"W3C\" Middle School",
  "skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "Java",
    "Python",
    "Lisp"
  ]
}
